tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mode_of_payment AS SELECT DISTINCT ON (1,2,3) a.amp_activity_id, val.category_value AS mode_of_payment_name, val.id AS mode_of_payment_code FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_funding fund ON fund.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_category_value val ON val.id = fund.mode_of_payment_category_va;
